requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.8GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8500
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller recommended

  • Processor: 2.8GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8500
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller recommended
